declaration_holder.name: Holcim (Romania) SA
declaration_holder.address: no.46D-46E-48 Pipera street, OREGON PARK: building B, floor 6, District 2, RO 020308, Bucharest, Romania

lca_consultant.name: ERM
lca_consultant.address: exchequer court, 33 St Mary Axe, London EC3A 8AA, United Kingdom

epd_metadata.epd_type: Environmental Product Declaration in accordance with ISO 14025:2006 and EN 15804:2012+A2:2019/AC:2021

product_use: Stabilize materials used in execution of road layers, especially foundation and base layers in rigid and non-rigid road systems
Execution of bituminous coatings through cold recycling technology
Expanding existing foundations, construction of platforms and parking spaces
Strengthen parking lanes, framing lanes and sidewalks
Execution of clothing for local roads or low-traffic streets as well as bituminous coatings using cold recycling technology
product_description.pbt_vpvb_status: Does not meet criteria for PBT or vPvB according to Annex XIII of Regulation (EC) No. 1907/2006 (REACH)
product_description.exemption: Cement/cementitious binders are mixtures and exempted from REACH registration

manufacturing_process_details.quarrying: Extraction of calcareous materials (limestone or marl) and argillaceous materials (clay) using drilling and blasting
manufacturing_process_details.crushing: Mechanical crushers reduce size from 120 cm to 1.2-8 cm; drying may be necessary
manufacturing_process_details.transport: Raw material transported by conveyors to plant
manufacturing_process_details.mixing_bed: Homogenization by stacking and reclaiming in long-layered stockpile
manufacturing_process_details.raw_mill: Milling and drying in vertical roller mill (Campulung Plant) or horizontal ball mill (Alesd Plant)
manufacturing_process_details.preheater: Cyclone preheaters preheat raw material before kiln entry; calciners integrated for efficiency
manufacturing_process_details.kiln: Heating raw materials to ~1000°C for decarbonisation and up to 2000°C in rotating kiln to form clinker
manufacturing_process_details.binder_production: Mixing cement with minor constituents at road binder plants; cement from Alesd mixed onsite, cement from Campulung transported to Pitesti for mixing
manufacturing_process_details.packaging: No packaging; products delivered in bulk by cement trucks

product_description.additional_information: Safety Data Sheets (SDS) available on Holcim Romania portal; compliant with EU REACH and CLP regulations

lca_information.goal_of_study: Generate environmental profile of DOROPORT®TB binder produced and delivered from Holcim Romania owned and operated locations to understand lifecycle environmental impacts and enable Type III EPD publication
lca_information.declared_unit: 1 tonne of DOROPORT®TB produced and delivered from Holcim Romania plants; weighted average based on production mass per plant

system_boundary.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1 to A3)
system_boundary.excluded_stages: Other life cycle stages dependent on specific building/construction scenarios; marked as MND (Module Not Declared)

data_sources_and_quality.data_quality: Very good; foreground data validated by mass balances; background data reviewed

allocation.allocation_basis: All flows related exclusively to binder produced

cut_off_criteria.mass: Inputs contributing less than defined percentage to mass may be excluded
cut_off_criteria.energy: Inputs contributing less than defined percentage to energy may be excluded
cut_off_criteria.environmental_significance: Inputs with low environmental relevance may be excluded
cut_off_criteria.total_neglected_input_flows_limit: Do not exceed 5% of energy usage and mass per module

excluded_materials.notes: Secondary fuels modeled as entering system free of environmental loads; emissions allocated to products

assumptions: No waste produced during clinker production
Difference between raw meal consumed and clinker produced due to water evaporation and CO2 release from decarbonation
lca_information.comparability: EPDs within same product category but from different programmes or non-compliant with EN 15804 may not be comparable

transport_and_installation.packaging: No packaging; product delivered in bulk by cement trucks

end_of_life.notes: End of life stages (modules C1-C4) not covered in this EPD; marked as MND

recycled_materials_handling.modelling_note: Secondary fuels modeled as entering system free of environmental loads; emissions allocated to products

additional_info.sustainability_strategy: Holcim Romania sustainability strategy implemented, maintained and governed by Holcim Group commitment; integrated management system compliant with SR EN ISO 9001:2015, EN ISO 14001:2015, SR ISO 45001:2023, BES 6001:2022
additional_info.safety_data_sheets: Available on Holcim Romania portal https://www.holcim.ro/ro/produse-si-servicii/produse; compliant with EU REACH and CLP regulations
additional_info.notes: EPD owner has sole ownership, liability and responsibility; EPDs within same product category but different programmes or non-compliant with EN 15804 may not be comparable
